$test.name: extensible-enum-custom-value
$test.description: Valid use of extensible enum with custom value object

meta.explain: Code simplified with custom optimization pattern.

type.reason: React-specific optimization pattern not in predefined enum

changes.description: Added useMemo to prevent unnecessary recomputation

data.rationale: The expensive computation was being called on every render. Adding useMemo caches the result and only recomputes when dependencies change.
